comments:
3.1 RC2, eclipse.buildId=I20050610-1757

I was searching for new features on the Eclipse.org update site for 3.0 with the
URL http://update.eclipse.org/updates/3.0
I expanded the search results for the Visual Editor. The exception occured
(silently) when I checked the checkbox for the Visual Editor 1.0.1 feature
(which also results in a wizard error message "Visual Editor (1.0.1) requires
feature "Visual Editor (2.0.1)", or compatible.").

Michael, 
Can you still reproduce this with 3.2? 
We fixed many problems in UM this spring and it looks like it was fixed as side affect of one of these fixes.
I can not reproduce this bug anymore with 3.2 RC7, so I will close it as FIXED.
